plot: While working on a farm, the Tennysons encounter a meteor-powered mummy that can transform living creatures into monsters.

Exasperated by the kids' lackadaisical attitude over doing their chores, Grandpa Max signs them all up to work on a farm, forbidding Ben to engage the Omnitrix to breeze through his tasks. A recent mummy sighting engages Gwen and Ben to investigate the area and, indeed, they find a mummy - a set of wrappings animated by meteoric energy that can mutate living creatures with its radiation.—statmanjeff
